about_the_game:
Weapons from movies and games.
Would you like to design these weapons yourself?
With this app, you can easily design a gun like the ones used in fantasy worlds.

With this app, you can create your own gun design with intuitive controls!
You can also make it actually work and enjoy the gun action!
The created illustrations can be used for wallpaper and other purposes.


To create an illustration, follow the steps below
1. Select the body of the gun
2. Select the stock
3. Select the barrel
4. Select the grip
5. Select the trigger
6. Select magazine
7. Select a scope
8. Select and place decorations
9. Run the preview and enjoy the gun action!

The size of each part can be freely selected.
Use the palette to paint the gun in your favorite color!

Create your own original gun!


Illustrations can be saved in PNG format.
You can also use your original gun as a decoration for your character.

Please let us know if there are any parts you would like to see added!

Saved image information will be saved to your device and cannot be recovered once you delete the app.
